This _____’s special strength stems from its love and care for an orphaned human child that the Pokémon has raised since the child’s infancy.
This _____ left its pack to raise a human child. The cloth _____ would wrap the child with has a comforting scent that calmed the child’s crying.
Once the vines on _____’s body tear off, they become nutrients in the soil. This helps the plants of the forest grow.
Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It’s incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it.
